content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (3, 4), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ゲーム開始。敵空母は右下(26,26)近傍にいる。我が空母は左上(3,4)にいるため、敵空母まで距離約30ヘクス。航空部隊の航続距離は22なので、空母を少し南東に移動させて索敵範囲を広げる必要がある。まず敵空母の大まかな位置を把握するため、右下方向に索敵を開始する。ASQ1を(25,25)付近に発艦させて敵空母を探索し、同時に空母を南東方向(10,12)程度に移動させて次の索敵に備える。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 10, "y": 12}, "launch_target": {"x": 25, "y": 25}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=25 y=25 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=17 y=20.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航空部隊の航続距離22ヘクスの制限を忘れていた。現在空母は(3,4)にいるので、航続距離22以内の座標に発艦させる必要がある。(25,25)は距離が約30ヘクスで範囲外。まずは航続距離内で最も南東方向の(17,20)付近に発艦させて索敵を開始し、空母も南東方向に移動させて次の索敵範囲を広げる準備をする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 10, "y": 12}, "launch_target": {"x": 17, "y": 20}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (17, 20) while at (5, 6).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (4, 5), en route to target (10, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (5, 6), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ASQ1は(17,20)に向かって索敵中。空母は(10,12)に向かって移動中。敵空母は(26,26)近傍にいるはずなので、ASQ1が(17,20)に到達しても敵空母を発見できない可能性が高い。空母が(10,12)に到達したら、そこからさらに南東方向の索敵が可能になる。ASQ2も発艦させて別方向を索敵させることを検討するが、まずはASQ1の索敵結果を待つ。現在は空母の移動を継続し、ASQ2は待機させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 6), en route to target (10, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (7, 10), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ASQ1は(17,20)に向かって順調に進んでいる。空母も(10,12)に向かって移動中。敵空母は(26,26)近傍にいるはずなので、ASQ1だけでは索敵範囲が不十分かもしれない。空母が(10,12)に到達すれば、そこから航続距離22で(26,26)付近まで届く可能性がある。今はASQ1の索敵結果を待ちつつ、空母の移動を継続する。ASQ2はまだ待機させておく。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 8), en route to target (10, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (9, 14), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ASQ1は(17,20)に向かって順調に進行中。空母も(10,12)に向かって移動中で、あと1-2ターンで到着予定。ASQ1が(17,20)に到達しても敵空母を発見できない可能性が高いが、まずは索敵結果を待つ。空母が(10,12)に到達したら、そこからより遠方への索敵が可能になる。現在は計画通り進行中なので、空母の移動を継続し、ASQ2は待機。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 11) while at (8, 10).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 11) while at (12, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (11, 11) (previously at (13, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 10), en route to target (10, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (12, 16), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "重要な発見！敵航空部隊BSQ1を(11,11)で発見。前回は(13,12)にいたので西北西に移動している。これは敵空母から発艦して我が方を索敵している可能性が高い。BSQ1の移動パターンから敵空母の位置を推定できる。BSQ1が(13,12)から(11,11)に移動しているということは、敵空母は南東方向、おそらく(20,20)以南にいる可能性が高い。ASQ1は(17,20)に向かっているが、敵空母はもっと南東にいるかもしれない。空母の移動を継続し、ASQ2を発艦させて別方向を索敵させることを検討する。まずはASQ1の索敵結果を待つ。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (8, 11) while at (9, 12).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (8, 11) (previously at (13, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (9, 12), en route to target (10, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (15, 18), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊BSQ1が(8,11)に移動。(13,12)→(11,11)→(8,11)と西北西に向かって移動している。これは明らかに我が空母を索敵している行動パターン。BSQ1の移動軌跡から敵空母の位置を逆算すると、南東方向、おそらく(20,20)より南東にいる可能性が高い。我が空母は(10,12)にほぼ到達。ASQ1は(17,20)に向かっているが、敵空母はもっと遠方にいる可能性がある。敵に発見される前に、より広範囲の索敵が必要。ASQ2を発艦させて(24,24)方向を索敵させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 24, "y": 24}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(BSQ1) while at (9, 12).
- your carrier(AC1) hit an enemy squadron(BSQ1) causing 30 damage while at (9, 12).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (17, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (24, 24) while at (9, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (8, 11) (previously at (13, 12)), HP 21/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (9, 12), en route to target (10, 12), HP 70/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (17, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (9, 13), outbound toward (24, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "重要な戦闘が発生！我が空母AC1が敵航空部隊BSQ1を攻撃し30ダメージを与えた。しかし我が空母もHP70に減少。ASQ1は(17,20)で敵空母を発見できずに帰還中。ASQ2は(24,24)に向かって索敵中。敵BSQ1はHP21と大幅に損傷しているが、まだ脅威。敵空母の位置はまだ不明だが、BSQ1の行動パターンから南東方向にいると推定。我が空母は敵航空部隊から逃れるため、北西方向に移動して距離を取る必要がある。ASQ2の索敵結果を待ちつつ、空母を安全な位置に移動させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 5, "y": 8}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 11) while at (8, 11).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (12, 11) while at (15, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (14, 13) while at (15, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (12, 11) while at (12, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (14, 13) while at (12, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (12, 11) (previously at (13, 12)), HP 21/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (14, 13) (previously at (16, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 10), en route to target (5, 8), HP 70/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (15, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (12, 16), outbound toward (24, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "新たに敵航空部隊BSQ2を発見！BSQ1は(12,11)、BSQ2は(14,13)にいる。BSQ2は(16,13)から(14,13)に移動しており、BSQ1と同様に我が方向に向かっている。敵は2機の航空部隊で波状攻撃を仕掛けてくる可能性が高い。両機とも南東から北西方向に移動しているパターンから、敵空母は南東方向、おそらく(20,20)より遠方にいると推定される。我が空母は北西に退避中だが、敵航空部隊2機に追われている状況。ASQ1は帰還中、ASQ2は(24,24)に向かって索敵中。敵空母を早期発見して反撃する必要がある。空母の退避を継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (12, 13) while at (13, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (16, 11) while at (12, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (11, 12) while at (12, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (16, 11) (previously at (13, 12)), HP 21/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (11, 12) (previously at (16, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 9), en route to target (5, 8), HP 70/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (12, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (15, 18), outbound toward (24, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊の動きが複雑になっている。BSQ1は(16,11)、BSQ2は(11,12)にいる。BSQ1は東に移動し、BSQ2は西に移動している。これは我が空母を挟み撃ちしようとしている可能性がある。ASQ1は帰還中で(12,13)、ASQ2は(24,24)に向かって索敵中。我が空母は(5,8)に向かって退避中。敵航空部隊の移動パターンから、敵空母は南東方向にいると推定されるが、まだ発見できていない。ASQ2が(24,24)に到達すれば敵空母を発見できる可能性がある。現在は空母の退避を継続し、ASQ2の索敵結果を待つ。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (8, 10) while at (5, 8).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (8, 10) while at (9, 11).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (16, 11) (previously at (13, 12)), HP 21/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (8, 10) (previously at (16, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (5, 8), en route to target (5, 8), HP 70/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (9, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (18, 20), outbound toward (24, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵BSQ2が(8,10)まで接近してきた！我が空母は(5,8)に到達したが、敵航空部隊BSQ2が非常に近い位置にいる。ASQ1は(9,11)で帰還中、ASQ2は(18,20)で(24,24)に向かって索敵中。敵BSQ1は(16,11)で少し離れているが、BSQ2が immediate threat。我が空母は更に北西に退避する必要がある。ASQ2がもうすぐ(24,24)に到達するので、敵空母発見の可能性がある。空母を(2,5)方向に更に退避させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 2, "y": 5}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (6, 9) while at (6, 7).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (6, 9) while at (7, 8).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (6, 9) (previously at (16, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 7), en route to target (2, 5), HP 70/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (7, 8), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (21, 22), outbound toward (24, 24), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵BSQ2が(6,9)まで更に接近！我が空母は(6,7)にいて、敵航空部隊との距離がわずか2ヘクス。非常に危険な状況。ASQ1は(7,8)で帰還中だが、まだ空母に到着していない。ASQ2は(21,22)で(24,24)にもうすぐ到達予定。敵空母発見の可能性が高まっている。我が空母は緊急に退避が必要。敵BSQ2が攻撃してくる前に距離を取る必要がある。空母の退避を継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) landed on the carrier while at (6, 7).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (7, 8) while at (6, 7).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (24, 24).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (7, 8) (previously at (16, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (24, 24), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ASQ1が空母に着艦完了！ASQ2は(24,24)で敵空母を発見できずに帰還開始。敵BSQ2が(7,8)まで接近しており、我が空母(6,7)との距離は1ヘクス。次ターンに攻撃される可能性が極めて高い。敵空母はまだ発見できていないが、ASQ2が(24,24)まで索敵しても見つからなかったということは、敵空母は(26,26)より更に遠方か、別の方向にいる可能性がある。現在の最優先は敵BSQ2からの攻撃を回避すること。空母の退避を継続し、ASQ1を即座に発艦させて敵空母の索敵を継続する必要がある。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 26, "y": 26}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=26 y=26 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=20 y=23.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航続距離の制限を忘れていた。現在空母は(6,7)にいるので、航続距離22以内の座標に発艦させる必要がある。敵BSQ2が(7,8)で非常に接近しているため、まず空母の退避を優先し、ASQ1は航続距離内で最も南東方向の(20,23)付近に発艦させて敵空母を索敵する。ASQ2が(24,24)で敵空母を発見できなかったので、敵空母は別の位置にいる可能性がある。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 20, "y": 23}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(BSQ2) while at (6, 7).
- your carrier(AC1) hit an enemy squadron(BSQ2) causing 24 damage while at (6, 7).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (20, 23) while at (7, 7).

- Your squadron ASQ1: position (7, 7), outbound toward (20, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (22, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "我が空母が敵BSQ2を攻撃し24ダメージを与えた！敵BSQ2はHP29に減少。しかし我が空母もHP46まで減少し、危険な状態。ASQ1は(20,23)に向かって索敵開始。ASQ2は(22,20)で帰還中。敵空母はまだ発見できていないが、ASQ2が(24,24)で発見できなかったことから、敵空母は(26,26)より北か西にいる可能性がある。現在は空母の退避を継続し、ASQ1の索敵結果を待つ。敵BSQ2は損傷しているが、まだ脅威なので距離を取る必要がある。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (8, 10) while at (6, 6).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (9, 12) while at (9, 11).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (23, 13) while at (20, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (23, 13) (previously at (23, 13)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (9, 12) (previously at (16, 13)), HP 29/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron ASQ1: position (9, 11), outbound toward (20, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (20, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "重大な発見！ASQ2が敵空母BC1を(23,13)で発見した！敵空母はHP100で無傷。我が空母はHP46で劣勢だが、敵空母の位置が判明したのは大きなアドバンテージ。敵BSQ2は(9,12)で損傷状態(HP29)。ASQ1は(20,23)に向かっているが、敵空母が(23,13)にいることが分かったので、ASQ1の目標を敵空母の位置に変更して攻撃させるべき。ASQ2は帰還中だが、敵空母を発見したので貴重な情報を持っている。まずASQ1を敵空母攻撃に向かわせる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 23, "y": 13}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "エラーを理解した。ASQ1は既に(20,23)に向かって飛行中で、飛行中の航空部隊には新しい指示を出せない。ASQ2も帰還中。現在は両航空部隊が任務中なので、新しい発艦指示は出せない。ASQ2が敵空母BC1を(23,13)で発見したのは重要な情報。ASQ1が(20,23)に到達後に帰還し、ASQ2も帰還したら、両機を敵空母攻撃に向けて再発艦させる必要がある。現在は空母の退避を継続し、航空部隊の帰還を待つ。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 15 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 11) while at (11, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (12, 12) while at (11, 15).

- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (23, 13) (previously at (23, 13)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (11, 11) (previously at (14, 12)), HP 21/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (12, 12) (previously at (16, 13)), HP 29/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (3, 5), en route to target (2, 5), HP 46/100, speed 2, vision 4.
